DOC.brief_summary: The study single arm , prospective study safety effectiveness Valencia Technologies eCoin System stimulate tibial nerve treatment patient refractory urgency urinary incontinence .
DOC.detailed_description: This trial single arm , prospective study safety effectiveness eCoin tibial nerve stimulation 25 subject refractory overactive bladder define American Urological Association.. The eCoin neuromodulation device implant subcutaneously right leave leg patient urgency urinary incontinence . After 4 week implant healing period , subject device activate ( turn ON ) . After 3 month device therapy ( occur 4 month post-implant ) , primary endpoint assess . It anticipate subject reach full therapeutic effect approximately 3 month therapy . Subjects follow additional 9 month assess safety maintenance stimulation therapy few session occur time interval .

Diagnosis overactive bladder urgency urinary incontinence mixed urge stress incontinence predominant urgency component , least 6 month ( selfreported ) . 3 . Individual least four urgency incontinence episode threeday void diary least one episode per 24 hour time period 4 . Individual urinary frequency , define average great equal 8 times/24 hour ( ie . total great equal 24 micturition 3 day diary ) 5 . Individual unresponsive , inadequately responsive , intolerant behavioral , rehabilitation , pharmacologic therapy . 6 . Individual able give write , informed consent . 7 . Individual mentally competent able understand study requirement . 8 . Individual willing able complete 3day void diary quality life questionnaire . 9 . Individual without pharmacological treatment overactive bladder ( antimuscarinics beta3 agonist ) 2 week prior screen . 10 . The individual demonstrates positive nerve integrity test . 1 . Individual predominantly stress urinary incontinence 2 . Individual clinically significant bladder outlet obstruction . 3 . Individual clinically significant pelvic organ prolapse . 4 .
